sourcesContent:
Work Experience

ATDOnline/TireProsOnline/NTDConnect

I undertook a multifaceted role in elevating the digital footprint of ATDOnline, TireProsOnline, and NTDConnect. This encompassed adeptly overseeing marketing content, serving as the go-to authority for all CMS-related matters, and taking the lead on diverse frontend initiatives. My responsibilities extended across content strategy, amplifying brand visibility, and fostering user engagement, all while ensuring a dynamic and continuously updated user experience through strategic CMS configurations. My primary objects included:

  • Collaborated closely with backend developers to design and develop dynamic frontend experiences that improve user interactions and content delivery.
  • Partnered with designers to create engaging landing pages to enhance user engagement.
  • Developed complex and targeted marketing experiences to cater to diverse audience segments.
  • Designed and executed various A/B tests, including enhancements like new header menus and cart previews, to refine the UX/UI and boost user satisfaction.
  • Conducted A/B testing on marketing ads to refine advertising campaigns and maximize their effectiveness.
  • Implemented GA tagging and analytics on all content to gather insights and drive data-driven decision-making.
  • Implemented and managed marketing and sales data using ImpEx files, ensuring data consistency and accuracy.
  • Managed all product imagery and mapping within multiple systems to ensure accurate product listings.
  • Served as the primary onboarding resource for new team members, providing training and guidance on complex content management systems (CMS) and digital asset management (DAM) tools.

Development Tools:

HTML5
CSS
JavaScript
jQuery
ImpEx
SQL
AJAX
JSON

TireProsOnline

For TireProsOnline, two prominent B2B websites, I had the privilege of taking on a multifaceted role that encompassed both website management and frontend development. With unwavering dedication, I managed every aspect of these digital platforms, ensuring their continued growth and effectiveness.

In my capacity as a website manager, I meticulously oversaw content updates, configurations, and maintenance. I curated compelling marketing content and meticulously segmented it to cater to diverse audiences. My responsibilities extended to orchestrating seamless user experiences, backed by robust data-driven strategies, to enhance customer engagement.

On the frontend development front, I spearheaded numerous impactful projects. From crafting captivating landing pages to engineering dynamic frontend experiences, such as an intuitive order history tracker, my focus was always on pushing the boundaries of user interaction. I leveraged cutting-edge technologies and innovative design principles to ensure the websites not only met but exceeded the expectations of their users.

The amalgamation of my website management skills and frontend development prowess led to elevated user satisfaction and tangible business outcomes. By harmonizing content management with compelling frontend projects, I played a pivotal role in fortifying the online presence of ATDonline and TireProsOnline, delivering intuitive, data-rich experiences that resonated with their B2B clientele.
